nodes.text: Rakatan wraith boxes were small, dark-colored boxes with engravings. In 10 BBY,[source?] Crimson Dawn crime lord Dryden Vos had at least two of the boxes in his personal museum aboard the First Light.

Rakatan wraith boxes first appeared in the 2018 anthology film, Solo: A Star Wars Story and were subsequently identified in Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide by Pablo Hidalgo. The boxes had first appeared in Star Wars Legends in Star Wars: The Old Republic.
